Text: RE Formosa PL Cc I told Carol to go ahead and book the mm based on Johns approval I also stated that it would be until June for us to sort out the inter business unit origination through the Risk and Accounting books I told her that Jean and John need to discuss how exactly this deal will be accounted for after August assuming not all goes according to plan Carol needs to book the mm and have Jeff Gossett get in contact with me to figure out the details Scott Original Message From Mrha Jean Sent Wednesday May AM To Lavorato John Cc Nowlan Jr John L Carter Carol Earnest Scott Subject RE Formosa PL Importance High Original Message From Lavorato John Sent Wednesday May AM To Mrha Jean Subject FW John The timeline is as follows Spoke with Nowlan this past Friday he agreed to pay us this week As such I had Carol Carter contact Scott Earnest his book person to receive monies Carol called me yesterday and informed me that Scott would not be sending the money and that Nowlan would be calling me I left a message with Nowlan yesterday asking him to contact me We had our conversation regarding the PL resulting from the Formosa deal I have ccd all relevant parties Regards Mrha Original Message From Nowlan Jr John L Sent Wednesday May AM To Lavorato John Subject RE why the note i talked with jean and told her it would all be sorted Original Message From Lavorato John Sent Wednesday May AM To Nowlan Jr John L Cc Earnest Scott Mrha Jean Carter Carol Subject I understand you owe Jean Million this week Please make sure its paid
